!Priest of the Earth Daichir: However, there is one problem... the Point about which I spoke too soon, and by the time we don't be able to prepare enough fighters. So I want to entrust the task to collect troops You. I think, You do a great job with this task. Gather the the Alliance of about 100 of the best (95-th level and higher). When the army is ready, You can go to the path. Remember, Your task - the destruction of the body of the Earth Worm Trasken. [Quest _478_NightmareOfDwarves 30537-5.htm|Listen more]
